mapper.sql: select oper_id, title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, oper_name, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg, oper_time from sys_oper_log
mapper.insert: insert into sys_operation_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, oper_name, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg, oper_time) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{operName}, #{deptName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{operParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, sysdate())
